title: Tracking Glacial Change with Landsat and Radar
description: NASA Scientist Alex Gardner highlights how Landsat made his research into the dynamics of glacial flow possible.
content: NASA Scientist Alex Gardner highlights how Landsat made his research into the dynamics of glacial flow possible.
